channel.title: IMPOSTER protection?
channel.description:
I have every day over 20 accounts named like
.jessica jessica. jessica jessica jessica (SPACES AFTER NAME)
This girl gets on and some how gets my mods to work with her and tells every one she got "reset" and her mod crowns gone and shes playing at library and cant make them mod right now or that shes not at home to get her crown back...
So can someone code me something that wont allow people to make account with Jessica in them? Or a No space and no . script?
After she scams money she says shell make them mod later and i have to deal with alot of noobs coming up to me and trying to get there mod. I keep annoucing people to not trust her but people seem to ignore or not see it. She gets over 500k a day on my server... So please help ASAP.
7 of my best mods she got banned due to getting them to help her.
OH yah her IP keeps changing too so its probley a dynamic...

item.title: IMPOSTER protection?
item.dc:creator: @Palidino76 Palidino76
item.description:
@Palidino76 wrote:

Do what I did 

		if (playerName.contains("jessica") && !playerName.equals("YourName")) {
		appendToBanned(playerName);
		disconnected = true;
		outStream.createFrame(109);
		}

You’ll see: && !playerName.equals(“YourName”))

YourName needs to be changed to the exact spelling of your name, whic hsi case sensitive, so if you caps any letters they need to be capsed there lol

Read full topic

}
